viewtier.ui
Class Flow

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--viewtier.ui.Component
        |
        +--viewtier.ui.Flow
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Flow
extends Component

Class Flow is a container used to create a sequential list of components. If component has a border, this setting is ignored.

See Also:
Serialized Form
